node.text:
Evidence-based natural solutions for mast cell activation syndrome (MCAS) and histamine intolerance.

I discuss histamine-degrading probiotic questions, herbs and vitamins proven to decrease histamine burden, and the natural plant-based extract that is more effective than cromolyn sodium.

This is not a substitute for medical advice, diagnosis, or treatment. Always consult a licensed physician before implementing any intervention.

Follow me on Instagram. www.Instagram.com/empoweredautoimmune

Sign up for my newsletter: www.empoweredautoimmune.com

Join my private Facebook group: https://m.facebook.com/groups/2096595183900470

node.title: Holistic Approaches for Mast Cell Activation Syndrome (MCAS)

node.text:
I discuss what research point to as the underlying cause of polycystic ovarian syndrome (PCOS) and some simple evidence-based holistic strategies to promote insulin sensitivity and thus address PCOS.

This should not be construed as a substitute for medical advice, diagnosis, or treatment. Always consult a licensed physician. 
Follow me at Instagram.com/empoweredautoimmune

Subscribe to my newsletter at www.empoweredautoimmune.com

Join my private Facebook group for women healing from autoimmune disease and chronic illness https://m.facebook.com/groups/2096595183900470

node.text:
I discuss the research that reveals the therapeutic potential of cannabis and psychedelic agents for reversing symptomatology of PTSD as well as anxiety, depression, psychosis, and addiction.

This is not to be construed as a substitute for medical advice, diagnosis, or treatment. Do not try any of these strategies without first consulting a licensed medical doctor. I am not a health care practitioner.

Read my article here on marijuana for mood disorders: 
http://www.greenmedinfo.com/blog/marijuana-future-ptsd-treatment

Subscribe to my email newsletter: www.empoweredautoimmune.com

Join my private Facebook group where I present research on reversing autoimmunity and chronic illness naturally (answer questions for entry): https://m.facebook.com/groups/2096595183900470

node.title: Marijuana & Psychedelics for PTSD: What the Science Actually Says

Subscribe to my newsletter at www.empoweredautoimmune.com

node.text:
"When you tear out a man's tongue, you are not proving him a liar, you're only telling the world that you fear what he might say." ― George R.R. Martin ⁣
⁣
It's an odd and Orwellian time indeed when data counter to the mainstream narrative cannot be discussed without the threat of being canceled, platforms jeopardized, and "fact checkers" with vested interests emerging from the woodwork.⁣
⁣
True scientific inquiry entails the development and exploration of dissenting hypotheses, evolution of newfound stances based upon the synthesis and assimilation of incoming data, and forums of uncensored, open, and civil discourse.⁣
⁣
As eloquently articulated by Albert Einstein, "Science can only flourish in an atmosphere of free speech."⁣
⁣
Critical to the emergence of safe products is long-term safety data, randomized controlled blinded trials of long-term health consequences in populations vulnerable to medical product induced injury (such as autoimmune cohorts), and manufacturers who are held liable and accountable for adverse reactions.⁣
⁣
Critical to informed consent is that consumers are given an opportunity to make their own decisions based on their own individualized risk-reward analysis and education on potential adverse sequelae, as no pharmaceutical product is without risk.⁣
⁣
Where there is risk, there must always, always, always be a choice.⁣
⁣
And where there is risk, there must be unfettered access to all sides of the story - there must be dialogue with dissenting and contrarian voices - as a litmus test for where the truth indeed resides.⁣
⁣
"Once a government is committed to the principle of silencing the voice of opposition, it has only one way to go, and that is down the path of increasingly repressive measures, until it becomes a source of terror to all its citizens and creates a country where everyone lives in fear." - Harry Truman

node.text:
When it comes to the consequences of your medical decisions, you are ultimately the one who has to live with them.⁣⁣
⁣⁣
In the case of iatrogenesis (harm incurred secondary to use of the medical establishment, one of the leading causes of death), it is you who potentially pays the price.⁣⁣
⁣
As such, only you can perform a cost benefit analysis and decide what's right--or what's wrong for you.⁣
⁣⁣
As a patient, you are entitled to informed consent—full knowledge of the potential benefits and risks of an intervention, at which point you can voluntarily acquiesce OR reject the procedure.⁣⁣
⁣⁣
Your body, your choice.⁣⁣
⁣⁣
We all having different family histories, genetic predispositions and polymorphisms, prevailing comorbidities, immune landscapes, microbial terrains, biochemical milieus, and propensities to adverse reactions—information to which no stranger is privy.⁣⁣
⁣⁣
It is not up to you to decide what is best for another person, just like it’s not up to a random stranger to dictate what’s best for your health. ⁣⁣
⁣⁣
Let’s stop judging people when we have no idea about the underlying medical conditions with which they contend, the harm they may have suffered at the hands of the allopathic medical establishment, or their legitimate reasons for abstaining from or partaking in any particular medical decision. ⁣⁣
⁣⁣
What another person does with their vessel—what medical procedure they consent to or refuse—is absolutely none of my (or your) business.

node.text:
If you're still asking "what do I do/take/supplement with to help condition X?" then you're fundamentally asking the wrong question.⁣
⁣
Conventional medicine uses linguistic buckets as a means of cognitively and logistically organizing complex patterns of symptomatic manifestation, which we call "disease."⁣
⁣
But in actuality, these classifications are not the clear cut, objective, discrete, reproducible entities we would like to think. ⁣
⁣
Conventional medicine fails to realize that the body is an integrated, interconnected, holistic whole.⁣
⁣
This is why so many of these different "disorders" tend to occur together--the POTS, the MCAS, the tick borne infections, the dysautonomia, the autoimmune conditions--nothing happens in a vacuum. This is because when one part of the body malfunctions, everything starts to operate off kilter.⁣
⁣
That's usually when Western medicine swoops into the rescue to match a condition with a drug, creating a situation of symptomatic whack-a-mole where each pharmaceutical-induced disturbance to physiology begets another undesirable symptom, putting you on a merry-go-round of petrochemical-derived drugs.⁣
⁣
The good news: in contrast, almost everything I did from a  holistic (read: commonsense) standpoint helped everything I had.⁣
⁣
This is because when you provide evolutionarily consistent inputs--sunshine, grounding, movement, restorative sleep, evolutionary compatible nutrition, community, purpose--the body knows exactly what to do.⁣
⁣
Once you ascertain how healing works--that it fundamentally entails giving physiology what it needs and getting out of the body's way--you realize diagnosis doesn't as much and it becomes more about rectifying imbalances and providing the ingredients for healing.⁣
⁣
Which dis-ease manifests is contingent upon where your weakest link lies--but the path to healing is oftentimes largely the same irrespective of whatever disorder Western medicine has attached to your constellation of symptoms.⁣
⁣
Of course, some treatments will have to be targeted according to biochemical individually, but there are fundamental pillars of health. Work with a licensed health professional.

#FurtherFoodPartner⁣
⁣
I’m often asked what I recommend for hair growth, and it comes down to the following⁣
⁣
☀️ Ensure adequate vitamin D⁣
🐟 Eat a nutrient dense diet⁣
🍎 Support the microbiota with plant polyphenols and fiber⁣
🛌 Engage in an anti-inflammatory lifestyle⁣
🔥 Address underlying causes of oxidative stress, like micronutrient deficiencies, stealth infections, and environmental toxicants ⁣
⁣
There is also a whole foods supplement I take every single day that has been a gamechanger for my hair, skin and nails: collagen peptides. ⁣
⁣
One randomized (R), double-blind (DB), placebo-controlled (PC) clinical trial demonstrated improvement in facial skin conditions, including skin moisture, elasticity, roughness, and wrinkles with consumption of collagen peptides.⁣
⁣
Another study found that oral collagen supplementation significantly improved skin hydration after two months as well as reduced fragmentation of the collagen network.⁣
⁣
They write, “The oral supplementation with collagen peptides is efficacious to improve hallmarks of skin aging.”⁣
⁣
Collagen may also help improve hair growth, as it can neutralize free radicals that damage hair follicles and lead to hair loss.⁣
⁣
The amino acids it contains can also be used to build keratin, the protein of which your hair primarily consists.⁣
⁣
Collagen peptides may also improve nail growth and decrease breakage, as has been the case for me!⁣
⁣
The ONLY brand of collagen which has generated these really spectacular benefits for me has been the women-owned and -operated @furtherfood⁣
⁣
Their collagen is grass-fed, pasture-raised, antibiotic- and hormone-free, and packaged in post consumer recycled jars (and they also offer wild-caught marine!)⁣
⁣
Right now through July 27 @furtherfood is having their Hottest Sale of the Summer.⁣
⁣
🥳 All their products are 20% off, excluding already reduced value bundles, with my affiliate discount code "ALI20”⁣

👈🏼 SWIPE FOR HUGE SAVINGS ON THE AIR PURIFIER I RECOMMEND 🤩⁣
⁣
As fire season plagues parts of our country, it is a good time to ensure you have a professional grade air purification system in your home. ⁣
⁣
🔥 Forest fires are notorious for liberating PM-2.5, a type of particulate matter linked to everything from diabetes to heart disease, as well as other harmful contaminants into the air that are damaging to respiratory and systemic health.⁣
⁣
AirDoctor, the brand I have used and relied upon for years (which was incredibly helpful to me living in Southern California during fire season) is running a special promotion where they are offering the BIGGEST discounts on these high quality air purifiers I have ever seen. ⁣
⁣
I have seen them go on back order during fire season in particular due to overwhelming demand, so I highly recommend you take advantage of this offer if you are interested, as it's only good *while supplies last.*⁣
⁣
Even if you don't live in an area affected by fires, it's always a good idea to have an air filtration system in your home - as we are inundated with toxic exposures in our homes as a byproduct of modern living.⁣
⁣
‼️This may be why the EPA states that indoor air can be up to 100 times more polluted than outdoor air, and classifies poor indoor air quality as one of the top 5 environmental threats to human health.⁣
⁣
For me personally, ditching the toxicants and investing in a high quality air purifier was one of the most helpful steps for me in healing from my many chronic illnesses, and I routinely get feedback from audience members about their sleep or inflammation improving after using this device - since it removes inflammatory agents from the air.⁣
⁣
This, it's one of the health tools that tops my list for best investments.⁣
⁣
👈🏼 Swipe to see why I chose AirDoctor over other companies.⁣
⁣
Not only does it remove harmful VOCs, ozone, and PM-2.5 from industrial pollution and forest fires, but it also reduces pollen, pet dander, mold, and other allergens.⁣
⁣
⌛️ This is a limited time promo so be sure to take advantage!⁣
⁣
🥳 These deep discounts are automatically applied with the affiliate LINK IN MY BIO! 👆🏼

node.text:
This is one of the most neglected arenas of healing, but it vitally important.⁣
⁣
Quintessential to the recipe for a healthy human being is sufficient activation of the vagal nerve, a key element of your parasympathetic “rest and digest” nervous system.⁣
⁣
The parasympathetic nervous system modulates functions once thought to be beyond your conscious control, such as respiration, heart rate, immune response, and digestive motility.⁣
⁣
Activation of the vagal nerve is foundational to healing almost any chronic illness, because vagal tone is inherently anti-inflammatory.⁣
⁣
The vagus nerve has important immunomodulatory properties.⁣
⁣
Treatments that improve vagal tone inhibit production of pro-inflammatory messengers called cytokines.⁣
⁣
Vagal tone is likewise related to ability to regulate the stress response.⁣
⁣
Stimulation of vagal afferent fibers in the gut influences production of neurotransmitters in the brain that are critical to psychiatric disorders. ⁣
⁣
In fact, commensal species in the gut microbiome may elicit a favorable effect on mood disorders like anxiety and depression via modulation of vagal tone.⁣
⁣
This is because the vagus nerve supplies a bidirectional highway between the brain and gastrointestinal tract—and is part of the “gut-brain axis.”⁣
⁣
Vagal tone may even be epigenetically inherited to some extent: one study showed pregnant women who scored high on measures of anxiety gave birth to newborns with lower vagal tone, such that it is important to optimize prior to pregnancy where possible. ⁣
⁣
Part of that is providing evolutionarily compatible inputs, but there are also techniques to engender more vagal tone—here are a few:⁣
⁣
✔️ intense gargling⁣
✔️ loud humming or singing⁣
✔️ yoga, tai chi, meditation⁣
✔️ diaphragmatic breathing⁣
✔️ tongue depressors - stimulating the gag reflex ⁣
✔️ vagal needling from a qualified practitioner ⁣
✔️ cold showers ⁣
✔️ grounding⁣
✔️ stretching back + midsection or occupit massage (learned via @marriedtohealth) ⁣
✔️ singing, mantra chanting, hymn singing⁣
✔️ strategic use of tooth picks in a technique developed by my friend @dr.scanestraro (see our previous reel demonstrating this with @dr.jess.md

node.text:
Welcome to the gang 👋🏽☺️ You're in good company.⁣
⁣
This post is not intended as a comprehensive, nuanced explanation of the ins and outs of the conservatorship system, which is undoubtedly overdue for overhaul and reform.⁣
⁣
This discussion merely serves to demonstrate that people's righteous outrage over the sad state of affairs surrounding @britneyspears conservatorship illuminates a broader desire for what the medical freedom movement is all about--a championing that Britney, or anyone for that matter, to retain control over what goes into their body and freedom to say yes or no to medical decisions.⁣
⁣
Body autonomy means that no one gets to impose mind-altering medications on you against your will.⁣
⁣
It means that no one gets to enforce interventions upon you without your consent.⁣
⁣
It means that you are entitled to full knowledge of risks and benefits of any procedure to which you may consider consenting. ⁣
⁣
The medical freedom movement advances the fact that we are all biochemically unique individuals, with different ancestral heritages, family histories, genetic polymorphisms, physiological landscapes, prevailing comorbidities, and microbial terrains that render us differentially susceptible to the very real possibility of iatrogenesis: pharma-induced harm.⁣
⁣
The medical freedom movement supports the fundamental notion that YOU are the foremost expert and authority over your own body and retain ultimate bodily agency, and as such, should have the final say in anything that goes onto or into your body. Period. ⁣
⁣
What do you think about the intersection of these concepts and the #freebritney movement?⁣
⁣
Do you think someone else, other than you, knows what's best for you when it comes to your body?⁣
⁣
Let me know in the comments 👇🏼

node.text:
When I was still a newbie to the realm of holistic healing, I became overly fixated on sequence and looked desperately outside of myself for the answers at the expense of my own intuition.⁣⁣
⁣⁣
I constantly appealed to my newfound so-called authority figures—functional and naturopathic medical doctors, online nutrition bloggers, and thought leaders in the natural medicine space—to tell me what was best for my own body.⁣⁣
⁣⁣
I was convinced that there was an inflexible order or hierarchy in which healing must take place and that I deviated from the properly proscribed path, I was screwed.⁣⁣
⁣⁣
Do I do a Candida protocol first, or do I tackle SIBO?⁣⁣
⁣⁣
Do I treat tickborne infections, or chelate heavy metals?⁣⁣
⁣⁣
Do I address mitochondrial dysfunction, or concentrate on “adrenal fatigue”?⁣⁣
⁣⁣
Do I fix my leaky gut, or correct micronutrient deficiencies?⁣⁣
⁣⁣
These questions reflect a fundamental misunderstanding about the nature of the way the body operates.⁣⁣
⁣⁣
Many practitioners swear there is a certain order in which you must heal the body, and many of these healers have plausible theoretical explanations for their philosophies.⁣⁣
⁣⁣
It’s reasonable for example, to have the pillars of health in place, before you go on to advanced biohacking measures and targeted supplementation.⁣⁣
⁣⁣
However, it is a gigantic red flag when you encounter anyone claiming to have the be-all, end-all to healing, or that THEIR way is the ONLY way.⁣⁣
⁣⁣
It’s usually my cue to run for the hills.⁣⁣
⁣⁣
You see, there are many routes to the same destination.⁣⁣
⁣⁣
The body is miraculous in its capacity for healing in that when you provision the ingredients for wellness and remove the interference to healing—when you effectively get out of the body’s way (and there are MANY ways to do this)—things begin to fall into place.⁣⁣
⁣⁣
Moral of the story: there is no ONE way, and you should flee from anyone who tells you otherwise. ⁣⁣
⁣⁣
There is no magic pill, potion, protocol or practitioner.⁣⁣
⁣⁣
All is not lost if you don't do things in a specific rigid sequence or peel back the layers in a particular fashion. ⁣
⁣
All you have to do is START SOMEWHERE, and your body takes care of the rest.

node.text:
I can't tell you the number of DMs I get from people asking what they should eat, how long they should ground, how much sun exposure they should get, what "to take" for condition XYZ (the last one is especially problematic since it simply supplants allopathic pill-for-every-ill polypharmacy with an equally reductionistic green medicine paradigm).⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣
⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣
The answer: I have no idea.⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣
⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣
I'm not in your body.⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣
⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣
I'm a complete & utter random internet stranger.⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣
⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣
I have no dominion over what you say or do, nor do I ever want it.⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣
⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣
I just share what works for me, after years of failed attempts, wasted money, an endless barrage of traumatic encounters with the biomedical establishment, disappointing & sometimes helpful interactions with more holistic healers, my own innate intuition, & lived experience with the convoluted & circuitous path to healing.⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣
⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣
I expect you to use your own discretion--to take what resonates & leave what doesn't. ⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣
⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣
To use trial & error, mobilize free resources at your disposal, & solicit professional help IF needed in order to arrive at the best conclusions & approaches for your own biochemical individuality, ancestral heritage, geographic latitude, food reactions, budgetary limitations, microbial terrain, & physiological milieu, which are undoubtedly different from mine.⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣
⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣
No part of me desires to play into guru culture where people relinquish autonomy in favor of blind obedience & conformity to some extraneous authority figure whose never walked a day in their shoes.⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣
⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣
Where people abdicate responsibility & individual agency in exchange for a hierarchical "because she said so" relationship with a conventional or natural practitioner.⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣
⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣
We tried that-it failed miserably.⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣
⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣
My unwavering message on this platform is unequivocal: think for yourself.⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣
⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣
Use your powers of discernment to decide what works best for you.⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣
⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣
Follow a variety of sources rather than subscribing to echo chambers of groupthink.⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣
⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣
Don't give up your gut instincts & intuitive knowing for someone else's version of truth.

node.text:
Granted, there are still symptoms I contend with that I'm actively addressing & layers of healing to be peeled back, explored & uncovered.⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣
⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣
By the same token, some of these approaches are much more difficult for me than others, especially in the midst of a flare (ahem mindset 🙋🏼‍♀️).⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣
⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣
I also acknowledge & experience myself that healing is inherently non-linear, constantly ebbing & flowing.⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣
⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣
In most cases, you are never all done or entirely cured.⁣
⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣
We ALL experience inevitable setbacks.⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣
⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣
We ALL have genetic predispositions & weak links in the chain--those proverbial chinks in the armor that cave under pressure when all conditions are ripe--when we are undernourished, under slept, under hydrated, or subject to stressors or suffer trauma.⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣
⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣
That said, these are THE BIGGEST lever movers for me & what's helped me go from bedridden & debilitated in my 20s, & damned to what allopathic specialists were INSISTENT would be lifelong disability to a life where I am traveling the world, defying the odds, reversing symptoms & pathologies, & writing my OWN version of my story.⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣
⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣
Rather than resigning myself to a fate divined in the treatment algorithms by the doctor demi-gods, dictated by pharma & determined by the white coats inextricably intertwined with that failing & oftentimes corrupt system--I chose & continue to choose another path.⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣
⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣
One aligned rather than divorced from the rhythms of nature.⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣
⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣
One where my symptoms are harbingers & messengers to be tended to, not suppressed.⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣
⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣
One where the body is imbued with infinite capacity to repair & regenerate.⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣
⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣
One where the body systems & interconnected & interdependent rather an antiquated reductionistic system of Cartesian dualism.⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣
⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣
One where I choose botanical medicine & evolutionarily compatible foods over synthetic cocktails of manmade drugs.⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣
⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣
& it's made ALL the difference.⁣
⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣
What works for me DOESN'T HAVE TO BE WHAT WORKS FOR YOU ☺️⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣
⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣⁣
What's helped you most?👇🏼

node.text:
SMOOTHIE FOR SKIN HEALTH⁣⁣⁣⁣
⁣⁣⁣⁣
I go weeks at a time with little to no fruit & then bam - I'm on a fruit kick.⁣⁣⁣⁣
⁣⁣⁣⁣
I'm a big proponent of leaning into your cravings (once you've kicked Candida & opportunistic overgrowths that can hijack your hormones & hunger/satiety messengers), especially if you've cleared the slate & have been on a whole foods dietary template for a while now, as they are your body's best indicators of what it needs!⁣⁣⁣⁣
⁣⁣⁣⁣
Fruit is a reservoir of vitamin C & bioactive phytonutrients that support biotransformation & elimination of toxicants as well as favorably modulate gene expression.⁣⁣⁣⁣
⁣⁣⁣⁣
Fruit is moreover a good source of prebiotic fiber that nourishes the commensal flora of the microbiome, which is intimately tied to skin health via the gut-skin axis.⁣⁣⁣⁣
⁣⁣⁣⁣
Antioxidants rich in things like dragonfruit, blueberries, raspberries & mango also support skin health via neutralization of free radicals which constitute a major cause of acne.⁣⁣⁣⁣
⁣⁣⁣⁣
This smoothie also includes healthy fats like coconut cream (you could also sub avocado) to help prevent blood sugar dysregulation, a root cause of inflammation (which again, causes acne in the skin).⁣⁣⁣⁣
⁣⁣⁣⁣
I also include collagen peptides in my smoothies to reinforce gut barrier integrity, which tangentially supports skin health, as well as can lower oxidative stress in the body via repair of intestinal tight junctions.⁣⁣⁣⁣
⁣⁣⁣⁣
@furtherfood collagen is the one & only I use - women owned & operated & offers the highest quality grass-fed, pasture-raised bovine & wild-caught marine collagen.⁣⁣⁣⁣
⁣⁣⁣⁣
Their Vanilla Collagen Peptides plus Beauty Mushroom is EXCELLENT for skin health, as it contains Tremella mushroom, known as “silver ear mushroom” in Chinese, “white tree jellyfish” in Japanese, & “snow fungus” in English due to its white coloration.⁣⁣⁣⁣

node.text:
This. Is. The. Secret. Sauce.⁣
⁣
People in holistic health communities become so overly focused on nutrition and potentially orthorexia-inducing “healing” elimination diets at the expense of addressing upstream, root causes responsible for lack of oral tolerance, food sensitivities, immune polarizations, and autoimmunity in the first place.⁣
⁣
ie. what I discussed in my last post: deficiency of SUNLIGHT and GROUNDING and circadian rhythm DISTURBANCE. ⁣
⁣
Sunlight instrumentally modulates the immune system via vitamin D production, leads to genesis of antimicrobial peptides that cull back immune-dyregulating stealth pathogens, and regulates everything from detoxification to sleep to autophagy (clearance of damaged cells) via its effect on our diurnal rhythms.⁣
⁣
Vitamin D moreover enhances populations of regulatory T cell (Treg) subsets which are critical to restoring gut lining integrity and balancing the disparate Th1, Th2 and Th17 arms of the immune system that can become polarized in the context of autoimmunity.⁣
⁣
Grounding provides a virtually infinite and accessible storehouse of electrons at the earth’s surface that circulate through the living matrix of our body and neutralize positively charged free radicals, which some scientists speculate may act as our primary antioxidant defense system.⁣
⁣
Circadian rhythm regulation through exposure to early morning outdoor wavelengths of light supports our hypothalamic pituitary adrenal thyroid gonadal (HPA-TG) axis and the fine-tuned hormonal symphony that fundamentally interfaces with the immune system. ⁣
⁣
Thus, many functional medicine doctors are treating the surface-level manifestations and still playing symptomatic whack-a-mole.⁣
⁣
Even herbal medicine can be merely palliative rather than corrective in this way.⁣
⁣
If your doctor is ordering a litany or expensive tests and prescribing convoluted supplementation regimens before addressing sun, grounding, and light exposure, they have a fundamentally antiquated and reductionistic understanding of the way human physiology operates.⁣
⁣
If you want to heal, Go. To. The. Source. ☀️🌍🌲👣 🌊
